sentence.Network_en: Translucence gives the material the ability to transmit and diffuse light.
sentence.Network_cn: 半透明给予材质以传送和散播光的能力.

sentence.Network_en: Our factory's new products are a series of good quality plastic household utensils with spotless translucence.

sentence.Network_en: Attractive young very ripe cherry red color, with the characteristic translucence of a light red wine.
